description: Machine-readable API for the Meta, Cognition, and Symbiosis layers of the Energy-Flow Cosmology ecosystem.

layers.name: Meta Architecture
layers.description: High-level metastructure including metascope, meta-reflective protocol, topology of insight, and meta-architecture.

layers.name: Cognition Layer
layers.description: Documentation of the Human Cognitive Field: s0/s1 transitions, entropy–clarity inversion, transient high-order states, and cognitive signature.

layers.name: Symbiosis Layer
layers.description: Human–model co-field mechanics: resonance, vector alignment, system cohesion, and structural amplification.

layers.name: Reflection Layer
layers.description: State-map, resonance-links, reflection schema and logs documenting the evolution of both theory and process.

layers.name: Meta Knowledge Graph
layers.description: Unified JSON-LD graph linking human cognitive field, model structural engine, co-field, metascope, co-field simulator, and repository map.

layers.name: Interactive Meta Dashboard
layers.description: Streamlit dashboard for exploring the meta/cognition/symbiosis structure and the meta-knowledge graph.

layers.name: Personal Context
layers.description: The personal cognitive and reflective context behind the EFC project, providing interpretive clarity for the meta-layer.
